episodes.name: Inside The Series
episodes.overview: Get a special preview of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds with host Wil Wheaton (The Ready Room)

episodes.name: Finding the Balance: Inside the Strange New Worlds Finale
episodes.overview: The cast and crew of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds discuss finding the balance between the new series and The Original Series.

episodes.name: Exploring Season 2
episodes.overview: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds stars Anson Mount (Christopher Pike), Rebecca Romijn (Una Chin-Riley) and Ethan Peck (Spock) join Wil Wheaton (Star Trek: The Next Generation) for an exclusive sneak peek of the series' second season!

episodes.name: Strange New Worlds
episodes.overview: Captain Christopher Pike comes out of self-imposed exile to rescue an officer gone missing during a secret mission.

episodes.name: Children of the Comet
episodes.overview: An ancient alien relic thwarts the Enterprise crew from re-routing a comet on track to strike an inhabited planet.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Illyria
episodes.overview: Una must confront a secret she's been hiding when a contagion ravages the ship, incapacitating the rest of the crew.

episodes.name: Memento Mori
episodes.overview: Pike must find unconventional Starfleet methods to deal with a malevolent force that attacks the Enterprise.

episodes.name: Spock Amok
episodes.overview: It's a comedy of manners when Spock has a personal visit in the middle of Spock and Captain Pike's crucial negotiations with an unusual alien species.

episodes.name: Lift Us Where Suffering Cannot Reach
episodes.overview: A threat to an idyllic planet reunites Captain Pike with a lost love. To protect her and a scientific holy child from a conspiracy, Pike offers his help and is forced to face unresolved feelings of his past.

episodes.name: The Serene Squall
episodes.overview: While on a dangerous humanitarian mission, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise stumbles into a harrowing game of leverage with the quadrant’s deadliest space pirate.

episodes.name: The Elysian Kingdom
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Enterprise becomes stuck in a nebula that is home to an alien consciousness that traps the crew in a fairy tale.

episodes.name: All Those Who Wander
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Enterprise crew comes face-to-face with their demons – and scary monsters too – when their landing party is stranded on a barren planet with a ravenous enemy.

episodes.name: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.overview: Captain Pike considers his path forward after encountering someone who brings his dark fate front and center — leading the officer to wonder if he can save himself from the future.

episodes.name: The Broken Circle
episodes.overview: A distress call from Lt. Noonien-Singh compels Spock to disobey orders and take the U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew into disputed space, risking renewed hostilities with the Klingons in a bid to aid their shipmate.

episodes.name: Ad Astra per Aspera
episodes.overview: Commander Una faces court-martial along with possible imprisonment and dishonorable dismissal from Starfleet, and her defense is in the hands of a lawyer who’s also a childhood friend with whom she had a terrible falling out.

episodes.name: Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow
episodes.overview: La'An travels back in time to twenty-first-century Earth to prevent an attack which will alter humanity's future history and bring her face to face with her own contentious legacy.

episodes.name: Among the Lotus Eaters
episodes.overview: Returning to a planet that dredges up tragic memories, Captain Pike and his landing party find themselves forgetting everything, including their own identities as he confronts a ghost from his past.

episodes.name: Charades
episodes.overview: A shuttle accident leads to Spock's Vulcan DNA being removed by aliens, making him fully human and completely unprepared to face T'Pring's family.

episodes.name: Lost in Translation
episodes.overview: Uhura seems to be the only one who can hear a strange sound. When the noise triggers terrifying hallucinations, she enlists an unlikely assistant to help her track down the source.

episodes.name: Those Old Scientists
episodes.overview: An accident while investigating a time portal sends Ensign Brad Boimler through time from the twenty-fourth century, and Captain Pike and his crew must get him back where he belongs before he can somehow alter the timeline.

episodes.name: Under the Cloak of War
episodes.overview: Captain Pike and his crew welcome a Klingon defector aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise, but his presence triggers the revelation of some shocking secrets.

episodes.name: Subspace Rhapsody
episodes.overview: An accident with an experimental quantum probability field causes everyone on the U.S.S. Enterprise to break uncontrollably into song, but the real danger is that the field is expanding and beginning to impact other ships—allies and enemies alike.

episodes.name: Hegemony (1)
episodes.overview: When the U.S.S. Enterprise investigates an attack on a colony at the edge of Federation space, Captain Pike and his crew face the return of a formidable enemy.

episodes.name: Hegemony (2)
episodes.overview: Pike leads a risky rescue behind enemy lines as the landing party flees a deadly enemy.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.overview: At a Federation celebration, an uninvited guest disrupts Spock and the crew's reflections.

episodes.name: Shuttle to Kenfori
episodes.overview: Pike and M'Benga enter disputed Klingon space to find a cure for Batel, as M'Benga's past resurfaces on a planet swarming with deadly creatures.

episodes.name: A Space Adventure Hour
episodes.overview: When La'An tests a prototype holodeck with a fictional case only she can solve, the consequences of failure get greater and greater, with the Enterprise hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: Through the Lens of Time
episodes.overview: Chapel and Korby's quest to uncover the next step in human evolution leads the Enterprise to a planet where ancient ruins hide a deeper mystery and a terrifying secret.

episodes.name: The Sehlat Who Ate Its Tail
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Commander James Kirk's first day in the Captain's chair of the U.S.S. Farragut takes a disastrous turn when the Enterprise is captured by a deadly Scavenger Ship.

episodes.name: What Is Starfleet?
episodes.overview: The Enterprise escorts cargo to help a war-ravaged planet, but controversial truths about it cause Pike and the crew to come under the scrutiny of an investigative journalist.

episodes.name: Four-and-a-Half Vulcans
episodes.overview: After the Enterprise completes a mission requiring several of the crew to become Vulcan, new problems arise when it is time for them to change back into humans.

episodes.name: Terrarium
episodes.overview: When Ortegas crash lands on a deadly toxic moon, where the chances of survival are slim to none, she finds herself stranded and forced to challenge her most closely held beliefs in order to survive.

episodes.name: New Life and New Civilizations
episodes.overview: When an ancient, evil alien force re-emerges, Pike must make one of the hardest decisions of his life to stop the evil from spreading.
